alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Greeley; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 2:17PM CDT until October 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and a bit of mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Little to no ice accumulation is expected. * WHERE...Valley, Greeley, Sherman and Dawson Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Saturday to 7 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While temperatures will be plenty cold for snow on Saturday, ground temperatures still remain relatively warm and it may take a while for snowfall to accumulate. This may also contribute to slippery road conditions if snow melts and then refreezes on area surfaces. In addition, there will be a small chance for some sleet mainly during the daytime hours Saturday, which could contribute to slick surfaces, but no accumulation of sleet is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
